sections.summary: i am a student with passion for making difference in the world. i believe that the world is always changing and moving forward and requires motivated people to help lead the way. i enjoy investing my time into amazing opportunities that helps me to grow as a professional and as a person while helping to create opportunities and benefits for others. i believe that it is important to invest in the resources you have as well as to invest your time in an organization even if that meant not benefiting from it at all.
